children: Reusable cloth shopping bags can go in the garbage.
Thick, reusable plastic shopping bags go in the recycling. Bundle together with other recyclable plastic bags (such as newspaper bags, shopping bags, and dry cleaning bags) in a plastic bag.
Stained, worn out, ripped, or damaged cloth shopping bags can be turned into new products through
. Some local thrift and second-hand stores are partners and will accept these items at their regular collection or drop box locations.
